excerpt: Are you growing curious about the Netflix schedule from April 21 to 27, 2025? Here is a list of movies and TV shows being added.

text: Netflix’s new TV and movie releases for April 21-27, 2025, include Bullet Train Explosion, You Season 5, Havoc, Part 2 of Pokémon Horizons: Season 2: The Search for Laqua, and many others. On April 23, the film Bullet Train Explosion drops on Netflix. It focuses on a panic-stricken situation on a Tokyo-bound bullet train, which can explode if its speed goes below 100 kph. The authorities decide to go to great lengths to save everyone’s lives on the train. Further, You Season 5 premieres on the streaming platform. The season focuses on Joe Goldberg returning to New York City to lead his perfect happy life. However, his happiness is short-lived due to the secrets of his past and his own dark desires. Also coming out on Netflix is the action-thriller Havoc. It revolves around a detective fighting against the underworld to rescue a politician’s estranged son. During this mission, he uncovers a dark world of corruption and conspiracy threatening the entire city. Additionally, Pokémon Horizons: Season 2: The Search for Laqua’s second part will be available on the streaming platform. The animated series resumes the exciting adventures of Liko and Roy. They continue to travel the world to find Six Hero Pokémon and also Laqua’s land, leading to exciting twists and turns. New Netflix releases for April 21 – 27, 2025 Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Netflix from April 21 – 27, 2025. April 21 Pangolin: Kulu’s Journey April 23 Bullet Train Explosion Carlos Alcaraz: My Way Battle Camp A Tragedy Foretold: Flight 3054 UnBroken April 24 You Season 5 A Dog’s Way Home April 25 Havoc Pokémon Horizons: Season 2: The Search for Laqua, Part 2 Jewel Thief – The Heist Begins For more Netflix content, check out the official trailer of The Four Seasons. Also, here is an exciting update on the forthcoming Netflix film, The Whisper Man.
html:
Netflix’s new TV and movie releases for April 21-27, 2025, include Bullet Train Explosion, You Season 5, Havoc, Part 2 of Pokémon Horizons: Season 2: The Search for Laqua, and many others.

On April 23, the film Bullet Train Explosion drops on Netflix. It focuses on a panic-stricken situation on a Tokyo-bound bullet train, which can explode if its speed goes below 100 kph. The authorities decide to go to great lengths to save everyone’s lives on the train.

Further, You Season 5 premieres on the streaming platform. The season focuses on Joe Goldberg returning to New York City to lead his perfect happy life. However, his happiness is short-lived due to the secrets of his past and his own dark desires.

Also coming out on Netflix is the action-thriller Havoc. It revolves around a detective fighting against the underworld to rescue a politician’s estranged son. During this mission, he uncovers a dark world of corruption and conspiracy threatening the entire city.

Additionally, Pokémon Horizons: Season 2: The Search for Laqua’s second part will be available on the streaming platform. The animated series resumes the exciting adventures of Liko and Roy. They continue to travel the world to find Six Hero Pokémon and also Laqua’s land, leading to exciting twists and turns.

New Netflix releases for April 21 – 27, 2025

Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Netflix from April 21 – 27, 2025.

April 21

  • Pangolin: Kulu’s Journey

April 23

  • Bullet Train Explosion
  • Carlos Alcaraz: My Way
  • Battle Camp
  • A Tragedy Foretold: Flight 3054
  • UnBroken

April 24

  • You Season 5
  • A Dog’s Way Home

April 25

  • Havoc
  • Pokémon Horizons: Season 2: The Search for Laqua, Part 2
  • Jewel Thief – The Heist Begins

For more Netflix content, check out the official trailer of The Four Seasons. Also, here is an exciting update on the forthcoming Netflix film, The Whisper Man.
